name: Hey, Guys!
description:
This is a guy!

Guys come in all Variants!

And Flavours

And it's your job to look after them! Guys will multiple, every 10 seconds when in contact with other guys! And those new guys will have traits from either parent, be it flavour or variant! Use the catalogue to buy new guys and give correct guys to customers! Have fun!

Hello, Ender here!

You will find that this game is not very fleshed out and is rather lacking in gameplay, so don't hesitate to leave a lower rating if you feel the game hasn't met your standards. I doubt I will continue working on this game, so while feedback would be appreciated, it likely wont go towards further development of this game. Thank you for playing, and have a good (insert time of day).

This game was made for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2.
